inn1.comm: strays way down the leg side first up, Rahim had no chance behind the stumps
better line this time from Mash, gets some shape away from outside off stump, left alone
now this one comes in from around off, Taylor thought it would go away and was in no position to play as it jagged back in, and was beaten
gives him an offcutter now, off the inside edge to fine leg
in the zone outside off from Mash, Chamu lets it go, again some away shape for the bowler
goes back in the crease to defend this length ball on off to cover
straighter this time on middle and leg, clipped in the gap at midwicket for a single, tight lines from Mash after that wayward delivery first up
lovely delivery from Shafiul, around off stump, and nipping away off the seam, he pushes forward and is beaten comprehensively
fuller now, driven forcefully down to mid off
digs it short, and Chibhabha goes for the pull, but he was late on the shot, and got it in the air just wide of the diving mid on fielder for the first boundary of the match
goes for the cut to a ball shaping away from him off a length, and misses
dug in shortish again and angled into the body, he is hit high on the thigh pad, and they take a quick leg bye as it rolls away in front of point
stays back in the crease, and guides this length delivery to third man for a single, deftly done
tucked away behind short square leg off the pads, and they rush through for a single
left alone outside off stump
worked away to midwicket off the back foot
gives him no room as he digs this one into the body, defended down the track

that was close! it was a pacy delivery on the stumps, and Chibhabha was hit high on the thigh pad, as the ball rolled away towards the off side, Taylor rushed half way down the pitch for a single, Chibhabha was in no position to run, Taylor rushed back and if the throw had hit, he would have struggled
left well alone outside off
thwack! it as in the slot outside off, and Taylor got down on one knee, and sent it racing through the covers for a boundary, excellent placement
loud appeal for leg before, but there was an inside edge there as he looked to clip the angled delivery through midiwicket
this one kept a bit low, and Taylor went back to punch it to Shafiul
squares him up a bit, he was trying to guide this length ball through midwicket, and it skidded through and he got a leading edge into the off side
fuller on the stumps, driven down to mid on
similar delivery, a touch wider outside off, he finds mid off this time with the drive
gets half forward and runs down a length delivery to third man for a single
short and wide, and he stands tall and slaps it through extra cover, who ends up chasing it all the way to the boundary, Razzak it was
another one now, take that, this ball was a touch fuller, he eased it into the gap at extra cover for another boundary

run out opportunity missed it was tucked away to deep square, they went for the second which wasn't there, the throw came to Rahim at a comfortable height on the stumps, the batsman was not even in the picture, but Rahim could not collect, what a let off
cuts him in half as it jags back from a length outside off
defended to cover

pulled away to backward square, they are pushing for the second run now, Taylor just about makes his ground as this time Rahim makes no mistake with the take, and whips off the bails, replays confirm that
defended off the back foot in to the off side, off an inside edge
mid on puts in the dive and saves a certain boundary, it was driven hard down the ground close to the non-striker, but the fielder ran across and saved four runs
fuller outside off, gets forward to ease it to point
another good effort in the field, this time at point, saves some more runs for Bangladesh
worked away into the gap at midwicket for a couple, not enough power on the shot to take it all the way
Bangladesh are throwing themselves in the field, it was cut away to the left of Shuvo at point who dived across and saved a certain boundary
no saving this one, overpitched on leg, and lifted over mid on for a boundary, clean hit
driven to extra cover, cannot beat the off side ring
punched off the back foot to mid off
good slower one outside off, Chibhabha was too early into the cut, and missed out completely
stays back on the crease this time, and eases another slower one in the gap between cover and point for a boundary, well played
and gets some turn right away outside off, Taylor is beaten as he pushes forward
reaches out to drive this tossed up ball to long off
Chibhabha waits for this one to turn, and cuts it away between cover and point for a boundary
gets forward to drive this one wide of mid on
defended towards short midwicket
quicker on the stumps, he pushes forward to defend down the track
goes across and tries to work this back of a length delivery to midwicket, gets it down to mid on, they abandon premature thoughts of a single

another run out chance, Chibhabha had punched a length delivery thorough cover, and they decided to go for the third, Chibhabha was a bit late in going for the run and had to put in a full length dive at the non-striker's even as Ashraful whipped off the bails, replays show he had just about made it
Mash is getting the ball to shape away from a length around off, Taylor lets it go
more away shape for Mash outside off, Taylor gets forward and shoulders arms
opens the face of the bat to guide this length delivery to the left of point for a quick single, and that brings up the 50 stand
gets forward and gets a thick outside edge in front of third man, and good running gives them two runs
defended off the front foot into the off side
slapped back to the bowler off the back foot
pushed down to long off for a single
quicker and going straight on the stumps, he goes back to cut it to point
turned to short midwicket who dives and fields

bowled 'em! spin gets Bangladesh the breakthrough, it was flighted nicely on the stumps, Chibhabha went for the big heave over midwicket on one knee, was beaten in flight, and the ball crashed into the stumps, he has thrown away a good start here
goes back to defend this back of a length delivery back to the bowler
Mash produces the edge, as the batsman poked at a delivery outside off, and it runs to the right of Rahim for a boundary, Mortaza can't believe it
now he strays down the leg side, the ball dies on its way to the keeper, and he fails to collect even as he puts in the dive
overpitched on the stumps, driven but finds short extra cover in the way
gets forward and leaves this length ball outside off with a flourish
gets an inside edge towards square leg as he defends off the back foot
tossed up and turning outside off, left alone

this is lovely bowling, it was flighted teasingly around off, and lured him forward, it turned across the bat face and Rahim had the bails off in a flash, replays show Taylor's foot was in the air as he pushed forward, he failed to get it back in time, and Razzak has removed the openers
another tossed up ball around off, Elton gets forward to push out to point
turns across the batsman, who leaves it alone
waits for it to turn, it was a touch short too, and cuts it away to sweeper cover
flighted on middle and leg now, defended down the track, bat and pad close together
flicked away in Caribbean style to square leg, runs down the track, but rushes back as there is no single there
pushes forward to defend to cover
on the pads, whipped away through square leg
shot! it was overpitched on leg stump, and he drove it through midwicket for a boundary with all the works, high elbow and full face of the bat
shorter this time, gets across and tucks it off the back foot through square leg
gives him another short one, but this one sails over the batsman's head, and is called a wide
gets half forward and guides this back of a length ball to third man
thump! Elton plonks his front foot forward, and swings this flighted ball from way outside off up and over wide mid on for a boundary, just hit across the line there
dropped Ashraful has put down a dolly at short extra cover, it was angled in full on the stumps, and he got a leading edge towards Ashraful who went down on his knees to cover the ball but clanged it

the drop hasn't cost Bangladesh much, Razzak is all over them at the moment, it was shortish outside off, but not there for the cut, Elton went for the shot anyway, and drageed the ball on to his stumps, another one goes
pushes forward to defend this one on middle and leg
he is getting it to turn big from around off, beats Taibu now as he pushes at it with bat behind pad
flighted delivery driven to mid off
tossed up full, defended towards cover
slower and a touch shorter this time, defended off the back foot
gets to the pitch of this tossed up ball and drives to sweeper cover
defended off the front foot
driven back to the bowler, this is good bowling
drives this overpitched delivery, but straight to mid off
tossed up around off, uncertainly presses forward to defend
quicker on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
almost got through him, it was tossed up on leg, and beat him in flight as he went for the drive
pushed out to point
hit down to deep square leg
driven to short extra cover
tossed up full on the stumps, defended off the front foot
turns across the bat face as he pushes out, and the outside edge rolls way to point
defended down the track off the front foot
tries to drive to long off but Shuvo dives and saves runs
pushed away to short extra cover, they are just plodding around here
tucked away to short midwicket, they are going nowhere, Bangladesh are slowly stifling them with spin
floated outside off, Taibu has a look and shoulder arms
on off stump this time and straightening, Taibu covers the turn and defends to the off side
this one bounces extra from around off stump and Taibu guides it carefully towards point
fuller on leg stump and Taibu drives to mid on
pushed through on off stump, Tabu goes back quickly and cuts straight to point
tossed up a touch, Taibu prods forward and defends. Muted appeal from behind, that may have hit bat and pad
loud appeal for lbw and Regis is a little lucky to get away with it. Tossed up on leg and turning into the stumps, he goes for a big sweep and misses. That hit him in front of leg stump. Close call
skips out of the crease this time and taps into the covers for a quick single. Taibu flies in horizontally to make his ground
eases one on off stump line into the covers
lovely loft from Taibu, reaches out to a flighted offering and slaps it almost kindly over the bowler's head. It rolls away for four more
Taibu jumps out this time and drives into the covers. An easier single on offer this time.
on the pads and tucked round the corner for one.
tossed up but on leg, driven away to the right of midwicket
some turn for Shakib from around off stump, left alone
defended towards point
pushed out to short midwicket
drifts way down the leg side, he rolls his wrists and gets the sweep behind deep square leg for a welcome boundary
again turn for Shakib from leg stump, defended off the front foot
punched away to extra cover off the back foot
Shuvo is flying away to his right to field a drive straight back off the front foot
waits for the turn, and cuts it away to sweeper cover
worked away square off the back foot
Taibu just stands upright in the cease, comes down the pitch, but Shuvo shortens the length and he can only push it back
driven back to the bowler
turning away, eased off the back foot to point
driven to short extra cover off the front foot
another drive finds the fielder, this time the bowler himself
driven down to long off this time
they are just rushing through the overs, and Zimbabwe are getting stuck, another front foot defence
stays back in the crease, and this quick delivery just rushes through, he gets his bat down in time
rocks back and cuts away to extra cover
defended back to the bowler
tries to break the shackles by charging down the track, but there is no room to work with, pushes back to the bowler
worked away to short midwicket
driven straight to point off the front foot
inventive from Taibu, he had set himself up for the reverse sweep even before the ball was bowled, and got the connection past point, could be risky that one
eased away to sweeper cover for a single
reaches out to smother the turn
skips down the track, but Shakib shortens the length, lovely bowling, again he can only push it back
almost got him there, it was on leg stump and he went for the sweep, was almost bowled round his legs, very lucky
worked away but straight to midwicket
worked away square off the back foot
down the track, and plays it out to extra cover
looks to rush down the pitch again, Shuvo bowls it short, played out to midwicket, stifling bowling
this was bound to happen, it was tossed up a bit, he went for the almighty heave, but got it only as far as backward point who took the simplest of catches, Shuvo is pumped up, Zimbabwe are tottering
full outside off, defended off the front foot
another flighted delivery, a tad wider outside off, gets forward and defends
another forward push down the track
swept hard through square leg, Shakib had overpitched, and Chakabva went for the shot and got the placement right
reaches forward to defend the flighted ball on the stumps
goes for another sweep, misses and is hit on the pads outside leg, the ball pops up in front of slip
driven to sweeper cover off the front foot
now pushes this one flatter, he plays inside the line waiting for the turn from outside off, it rushes past straight to beat him
he is getting the connection on the sweep, another one, this time in front of square, they need more of these
defended off the inside edge towards midwicket
tries the scoop now, gets down on one knee and gets it in the air fine down the leg side
turning down the pads, worked away to short fine leg
pushed back to the bowler who dives across to field
reaches out to defend towards extra cover
tossed up outside off, pushed away to short extra cover
gets an inside edge very close to the stumps on the leg side as he presses forward
played out towards mid on
pushed out to extra cover
right on the stumps, patted back down the track
flatter and quicker, worked away to midwicket
defended off the front foot back to Shakib
shimmies down the track, Shakib shortens the length, he works it away to square leg
rare poor ball from Shakiib, full toss, put away through extra cover for a boundary
and works this one away for a single
full outside off, hammered away just wide of the man at extra cover
closer to the stumps, he can only push it out towards cover
tossed up on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
fuller on leg, leans forward to turn it in front of square
good urgency, down the track and pinches a single towards mid off
fuller on leg again to Ervine, worked away to midwicket
on the money around off, pushed back to the bowler
eased away to sweeper cover off the front foot
another dot delivery, pressure building all the time
skips down the pitch and drives down to long on
pushed out to cover, Ervine wants the non-existent run, is sent back rightly
rocks back to cut this flat delivery to sweeper cover
angled across Ervine, who guides it with an open face to short third man
fuller on the stumps, nicely paddled away to fine leg
down the track, and steals a single to mid on, who fires in a wild throw, and it goes fine behind the stumps for four overthrows, Razzaq it was
worked down to long on off the back foot
pushed out to cover off the front foot, no room to do more than that
almost stumped down the leg side, it was pushed through quicker, Ervine missed but had his foot just inside the crease, unlike Taylor
steered to short third man
punched to sweeper cover for a single
turning in from outside off, defended off the front foot
pushed towards extra cover off the front foot
guided towards point this time
angled across him, goes straight on, he misses out on the punch, and is beaten
played out to point now
swept away for a single
nearly got him, it was pushed through straight, got the inside edge as he stabbed at it, but just about missed the stumps
walks down the track and pushes towards cover for a quick single
goes back to work it to midwicket
hares down the track, gets an inside edge towards midwicket, both meet midway for the single, and then rush back as the throw comes in
guided to the right of slip
strays down the leg side, he misses on the nurdle
patted back down the track
flatter and quicker, pushed back to the bowler
skips down the track and swing it away to deep midwicket
worked away to fine leg
goes for the sweep, but mistimes it in front of short fine
gets it alright this time, down to deep square leg
clipped straight to midwicket
down the track and hit down to long on
gets forward and gets an inside edge through square leg
goes back and works this away through midwicket
tossed up and driven but a diving midwicket prevents the run
short and turning away outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
flatter and turning down the pads, hit down to deep square leg
fuller but on the pads again, driven through midwicket
flighted outside off, defended off the front foot
flatter around off, pushed out to cover
short, and slowly turning in, pulled away but straight to deep midwicket
almost yorks himself as he rushes down to this tossed up delivery
guided to third man off the back foot
angled down the pads, just helps it on its way with the paddle fine or does he, its given as byes
flicked away off the pads towards short fine leg
loud appeal for lbw, as he was struck on the pads, was looking to reverse sweep, but missed it totally, looked to be sliding down leg
hit down the ground for a single
on the pads, helped away to fine leg for another single
whipped down to long on
tossed up ball worked to midwicket, Chakabva wants the run, and ends up running it, half way down the pitch, and then retracing his steps back
good delivery to end the over, he can not do much with that one
down the track, and down towards mid on for a single
skips down the pitch, they are using their feet nicely now, and it is driven into the gap at midwicket, Ashraful puts in the dive from long on and saves the boundary
much quicker, he is stuck on the crease and struck on the pads, but the appeal is turned down, was there an inside edge there?
fuller and driven down  to long off
eased away wide of extra cover, Ashraful running in misfields
worked away towards point for a quick single
takes this one on the full and drives down to long on
flighted on the stumps, worked away to midwicket
short and turning in, keeps low but he adjusts to cut it away to sweeper cover

what a soft dismissal, he just walked down the track, and hit this flighted delivery straight back to Mahmudullah who goes down to his left as he takes it, Chakabva has thrown it away here, just when Zimbabwe seemed to have got over the tough middle period
and goes for the paddle sweep right away to a ball around off, and gets it down to fine leg
down the leg side, Ervine sweeps it fine in its way, Ashraful picks up the ball and throws it in the air in no man's land, and they take the second
down the track and nurdles it towards square leg for a single
short, wide, not much turn, slapped away to sweeper cover
punched to extra cover off the back foot
sharp turn from a shortish length, he is hit on the pads as he comes down the pitch
punched to extra cover
goes for the sweep, gets it high in the air but it calls short of the man running in from deep square leg
fired wide down the leg side
down the track and hit down to long on, have to do that more often
over pitched on leg stump, driven to long on
just falls short of a diving Shuvo at midwicket, it stopped up a bit on the batsman and he worked it in the air towards Shuvo
defended into the off side
guided behind point, they go for the quick single, but replays show the dive in has saves Utseya
again this one stops a bit on him, punched in the air down to long on off the back foot
shortens the length as he sees him coming down, punched away to extra cover
rocks back and cuts but straight to deep extra cover
worked away to midwicket off the back foot
takes it on the full from outside off, and sweeps to deep square leg
can't beat extra cover with the front foot drive
comes down the track, there is no option really, and mows this one from outside off to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, slammed down wide of long off
makes room outside leg and drives but cannot beat extra cover
stands outside leg before the ball has been bowled, he fires it in, he can only take a single towards midwicket
and we have a boundary! he skipped down the track, and lifted this tossed up ball over mid off for a four
fuller and driven down to long on
follows him on leg stump as he looks to make room, pushed back to the bowler, lovely bowling
flighted outside off and driven wide of mid off for a run
another flat ball angled in to the batsman, hit back to the bowler
arm ball again, coming in with the angle, worked away to deep midwicket
and Ervine has holed out to long on here, this is slow death, there was no option but to try and go over the top, but he hit it straight to Ashraful at long on
flighted around off and coming in, mistimed to extra cover
nurdled into the on side for a single, can't get more than that with this stifling line
down the track and driven down to long on
gets across and drives, but finds midwicket
goes still further across, outside off in fact, and works this delivery to square leg
follows him with an angled ball as he makes room, he can only hit it down to mid off for a single

gets it in the gap this time, it was a high full toss, he came down the track, and got it between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a boundary, both men tried to stop it with their feet, but it rushed past them
tucked away square for a single
leading edge in the air as he charges down, but straight over the bowler's head and falls safely
over pitched on the stumps, driven down to long off
sweeps in the air from outside off and gets a single down to deep midwicket
gets good connection thsi time, comes down the track and lifts this flighted delivery over midwicket for a boundary
makes room and cuts it but there are two fielders in that backward point region
another one goes! it was flighted around off, and he tried to go straight down the ground, but only got it as far as mid off who pouched it, Razzak has four
Bangladesh miss another run out chance, it was driven towards mid on, Shakib put in the dive from midwicket but could not get the throw to the bowler with the batsman way out of his ground
tucked away through midwicket

Shuvo has taken an excellent catch at wide long on, Utseys looked to heave it over that region, got it high in the air, and Shuvo ran hard and dived to his right to take the catch, he's been outstanding in the field today, one more Zimbabwe wicket falls
flighted nicely outside off, gets forward and drives down to long off
goes for an extravagant reverse sweep, misses completely, it goes fine down the leg side off the pads
goes back and works it in front of square leg
bowls it slower, he looks to run it fine, and misses
one more to Shuvo, Meth gave him the blind charge, looking to mow it over midwicket, it turned past him, and Rahim did the rest
leans forward and wristily turns this delivery from outside off through midwicket for a couple, Price had to rush back for the second
pushed out to cover

goes for a slow motion paddle sweep, it loops up and falls short of the man at short fine, he fires in the throw, Mpofu was looking for the single, found he had to turn back, tried doing so in slower motion, and was well short of the crease, and that's the end of that

inn2.comm: and he is away with a tuck off the pads through square leg to a short of a good length delivery
fuller and bit of inward shape around off, jams down his bat at it to push it to the bowler
getting it to straighten is Mpofu, into the lefthanders, played out to  midwicket
bang on target again, around off, defended towards cover off the back foot
gets forward and drives on the up into the gap at cover to get off the mark with a single
Tamim goes for the big punch off the back foot, bottom edges it to short extra cover
picks this one off his pads down to fine leg
steered away to third man for a single
beats him with one angled across him outside off, it pitched on a length and just took off post the outside edge
gets forward and opens the bat face to guide it to third man
goes away of the seam after pitching on leg, keeps low too, Tamim adjusts to play it out to short midwicket
ooh, that was close, he had his front pad too far forward, it straightened from around middle, and he just a bout got an inside edge onto pad which rolled away backward of square, else he was a goner
Mpofu digs it in short, and it climbs sharply and zips past the outside edge around off stump
looks to punch off the back foot through extra cover, there is not enough room, and ends up hitting it back to the bowler
Mpofu strays on the pads, and is flicked away to deep square leg
back of a length and on target, pushed out to short extra cover off the back foot
goes for the booming drive through covers, but the ball comes off slowly off the pitch, and he gets a bottom edge back to the bowler
surprises him with some extra bounce now from a length, he takes one hand off the bat as he keeps it down on the off side, it was in the air for some time
short and wide, at gentle pace, and is slapped away over cover for a boundary
Tamim throws everything at this overpitched and wide delivery, and gets it high in the air over extra cover, the ball is pulled back near the ropes
gets an inside edge towards midwicket as he pushes forward to a length delivery on middle
wicket-to-wicket from Meth, worked away off the back foot to square leg
now this one goes away with the angle from off stump, he finds thin air with the attempted cover drive
pushed down to the bowler off the back foot
bounces from back of a length, punched down to mid on
bowls it slower and on the stumps, watchfully forward in defence is Tamim
goes for the pull, the short ball does not bounce much, is hit on the thigh pad and it rolls away to point
whipped in the air off the back foot down to deep midwicket, the ball is not coming onto the bat
Tamim gets some width, and pounces on it, hops in the air as he cuts it down to third man
more width outside off, this time he gets the placement right, and punches it to the left of third man who outs in the dive, but the ball rolls over the ropes
inviting the drive with a full delivery that goes away with the angle, he gets forward and shoulders arms
drives it in front of mid on and pinches a quick single as the fielder is slow off the blocks, and fails to pick it up cleanly
fuller and going across him, he defends to point
on a length around off, he gets right forward in defence
looks to forcefully punch it through the gap at wide mid on, gets an inside edge towards deep midwicket
they steal another single as it was pushed down the ground, Kayes just made his ground at the striker's as the throw came in from mid off
shortish, and pulled away on one le,g but straight to the man at mid on
Mpofu gets away with a wide one, as Tamim crashes it straight to backward point
punched off the back foot right off the middle of the bat, short extra cover runs across to field
fuller on the leg stump, turned to a diving short midwicket
drives this overpitched ball straight to short extra cover
almost gets his man here, it stopped a bit on him as he looked to drive it through midwicket, and went in the air just over a leaping short midwicket
gets forward and turns this delivery on middle and leg in front of square
punched to a shortish extra cover off the back foot
driven down the ground, but straight to mid on
tries to drive this length delivery, but cannot beat point
beats everyone this time, lifting this overpitched delivery up and over mid on for a boundary
beats him with one that comes in with the angle, he was looking to guide it down to third man
good line this, not giving him the width that he likes, pushed out to point
clips this length delivery off his pads to deep midwicket
flicked away straight to short fine leg off the pads
drives this angled delivery going across him wide of extra cover
clipped off the legs, but cannot beat short fine leg
gets forward to a length delivery, again on the pads, and turns it to deep midwicket
serves up a loopy gentle full toss around off, and it is put away through extra cover, the fielder escorts it to the boundary
better length this time, worked away to midwicket
this one comes in from round the wickets, beats him as he punches outside the line, and hits him on the back leg off an inside edge
Tamim gets one in the slot around off, and swings it back over Meth's head for a one-bounce boundary
Meth bowls a slower one, really slow at 97.7 kph, and it takes ages to reach Tamim who pushes it down to mid off
opens the face of the bat to guide this angled delivery to squarish third man
the surprise bouncer from Mpofu, he ducks underneath it
on the pads, he misses out on the attempted glance and it rolls away to square leg
short of a good length this time on the stumps, punched away to extra cover off the back foot

Mpofu belts out an appeal for leg before, and continues to shout till the umpire belatedly raises his finger, it pitched about half a foot outside leg, and struck Tamim on the pads, but he has to walk back, what a decision to get on your comeback
climbs on Junaid from around a length, he pushes at it and gets a thick edge down to third man off the high part of the blade
tossed up ball driven down to long off
flighted on leg stump, pushed out to midwicket
gets across to work a similar ball to square leg
fuller on the stumps, he stays on the back foot and jams down his bat at it as it rushes in on middle stumps
driven wide of extra cover
flatter outside off, he goes down on a knee and gets it into the gap at backward point for a boundary, good placement, opened the bat face as he went through with the shot
back of a length on the pads, tucked away backward of square
pitched fuller around off stump, reaches out to push towards point
stands tall and punches into the gap at extra cover for a boundary, it was in the slot outside off and he got the placement perfect
plays out this delivery on off to point with an open bat face
clipped in the air off the back foot, but well short of the man at midwicket
on the stumps, no width at all, pushed back to the bowler, excellent spell this has been from Mpofu
thumped down to long on off the back foot
flighted further up this time, defended off the front foot
mistimes the drive back to the bowler
worked away to short square leg off the back foot
pushed out to point off the front foot
turning in from leg stump, he looks to punch it down the ground, but Utseya fields in his follow throught
tosses this one up from round the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
another flighted delivery on middle stump, driven back to Price
a touch shorter, and he goes back and works it in front of square
turned away to midwicket off the front foot
drifts on the pads, he flicks it to the right of short fine, who dives and fields
tucked away for a single to retain strike, good first over from Price
short and turning away, goes back to cut it wide of sweeper cover who runs and keeps them to one
punched down to long on off the back foot
lovely flight from Prosper on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
watchfully forward in defence
gets forward to defend it in to the on side
tossed up and turning in from off and middle, played out into the on side
goes across to work this one to midwicket
stays back and punches down to long off
flighted up nicely outside off, guided to point off the front foot
fuller this time, swept away to deep square leg
worked away for a single, steady over from Price
strays down the leg side, and its a wide
defended off the front foot down the track
goes for the booming cover drive, it goes in the air and falls just short of the diving short extra cover fielder
punched down to long on
defended off the back foot
leans forward and is rapped on the pads, but the umpire shakes his head, that looked close
pushes forward in defence
skips down the track and drive to long on, they will need to start doing more of this
watchfully forward in defence
backs away outside leg, but there is no room and he hits it back to Price
gets some width this time, and punches to wide long off
tossed up delivery, clipped away in front of square who fails to pick it up cleanly
tossed up on middle, gets forward to push it back to the bowler
looks to come down the track, but can only defend it down the track
fires it in quicker, he jams down his bat to block it
flighted around off and almost gets him, he drove it in the air over extra cover, and it almost carried to the man running in from long off, but he missed it and it rolled away for four
defended off the front foot
defended towards cover and the single is on
clipped away to midwicket
sweeps straight to backward square leg
turned to midwicket off the back foot

and he's holed out to deep midwicket here! it was tossed up around middle, he skipped down the track, and swung it straight to the man there on the midwicket boundary, Price lets out a roar, Kayes has to walk back
flighted nicely outside off, driven down to long off
and he is off with a sweep to the deep backward square leg boundary, it was full on the stumps, and he got the placement alright, the crowd comes alive
tossed up on the stumps, he stays back and punches to long off, Utseya cannot cut it off even as he runs across

pushes this tossed up delivery in front of point, and they go through with the risky single, the throw is right on the stumps, Taibu has the bails off in a flash, and Junaid is run out by miles, he starts to walk back even before the red light comes on from the third umpire, game on here
and is away as he eases this flighted delivery through extra cover for a single
gets forward to this delivery turning in and gets an inside edge that rolls away on the leg side
pushes down the track off the front foot
goes across the stumps, and tries to work this one away fine, but there is a man at short fine leg and he cuts it off
gets the the pitch of this tossed up delivery, and drives it along the ground to long off
shortish and going on straight with the arm, punched away to cover
worked away square off the front foot, and hares across for the single even as the throw comes in at the non-striker's end
turns this tossed up ball to midwicket off the back foot
goes back and cuts this delivery turning in from off stump, but straight to cover
punched down to long off to retain strike
turned to midwicket off the back foot
punched down to long on off the back foot
short and turning in from outside off, cuts it away to sweeper cover
turned in the air but into the gap through midwicket, that could have been close
gets forward to defend this flat delivery down the track

and Ashraful is gone! he gave himself room to steer this delivery that turned in quite a bit from outside off, missed the line completely, and heard the death rattle behind him, an early dismissal for Ashraful on his comeback, Zimbabwe are right in this game
takes a step down, and drives in the air to the right of a diving midwicket, but it was too far from him and it rolled down to long on
gets right forward to defend down the track
gets behind the line of this tossed up delivery and defends down the pitch
teasing flight from Price, trying to prise out a wicket, Rahim gets forward in defence
hits him on the pads with a quicker one, but that looked to be going down leg, and Price's appeal is turned down, he knows how close it was
clipped away backward of square off his toes, they go for the second, and Shakib makes it back comfortably
gets some width outside off, and he rocks back and cuts it in a flash through backward point for a boundary
gets down the track and eases it down to long on
flights this one on off stump, he digs it out towards mid on, the bowler runs across and fields, and Rahim rushes back, he was half way down the track already
makes room and hits this one turning in down to long on
that could have been close, Shakib got a leading edge as he went back to this one, and it looped up in the air to fall short of Utseya
worked away square off the back foot, now Shakib wants the single, and is down half way, but is sent back rightly by Rahim

bowled 'em! beats him in flight, it was tossed up around middle and leg, almost yorker length, he played all around it, and it crashed into the stumps, Bangladesh are getting a taste of their own medicine here, Zimbabwe's spinners are on fire at the moment
defended off the front foot
calmly pushed down the track off the front foot
tossed up and angling across the left-hander, driven off the front foot to extra cover
nicely flighted up, he was in two minds, whether to go back of forward, decided to stay back in the end and played it out on the leg side
punched back to the bowler
pitches it fuller, and he gets forward and drives down to long on
much fuller this time outside off, driven to short extra cover
comes forward and defends down the track, good steady stuff
on the leg stump, driven down wide of long on for a single to bring up the 100
goes back in the crease and pushes back to the bowler
gives him some width and he hammers it wide of long off for a couple of runs
shorter this time, pulled away to deep square leg, missed out there
tossed up on off stump, driven to extra cover
pushed back to the bowler
driven down to sweeper cover for a single
glided into the gap between cover and point
tossed up outside off and turning in, lashes against the turn to deep cover
over-pitched on middle and leg, punched with the full face to mid-on
back of a length on off stump and coming in, he rocks back and cuts it through the covers
looks to loft with the spin over mid-on, but can't get it away for a boundary. The pressure mounts
stays in the crease this time and plays him with the spin towards mid-on
tossed up on leg, he looks to work it against the spin through the leg side and gets a bit of a leading edge, but it falls safe
Shuvo reaches out and drives through the covers, with the spin for a safe single
Shakib looks to work one off the pads and misses, bowler and keeper go up in a loud appeal, but that was mostly in hope. It landed a few inches outside leg.
plays watchfully into the off side
clips him off the pads against the spin and he will pick a single to square leg
another loud appeal, Shakib is hit on the pads as he looks to work it from outside off. Turned down.
defends this one from off stump line towards the covers
over-pitched on middle and leg, he drives it towards midwicket
edged? steered? Shuvo will say it was the latter, he did belatedly open the face and guided it perilously close to the keeper. Oohs and aahs all around but it purrs away to the boundary

another one bites the dust. Shuvo is run-out, guiding one from off stump towards point and taking off for a non-existent single. He turned back belatedly, but gave enough time for Chigumbura to pounce on it and fire in a perfect throw for Taibu to do the rest.
Mahmudullah defends the first ball down the track. This task is getting steeper by the moment.
Shakib presses forward and drives out past extra cover for a single
Mahmudullah moves forward cautiously and defends down the track
opens the face and steers towards point this time
gets it away for a single through the off side for a single this time.
Shakib picks a single to the leg side
big spin, big bounce, Mahmudullah does well to let it do its thing. It runs away down the leg side and all the way to the fence
and he finishes off with another watchful block to the off side
full toss outside off, Shakib can't quite capitalise, and picks a single to the leg side
opens the face and steers a single to the off side

you won't see a more earnest appeal. Dabengwa hits Shakib on the pads, turns behind, goes down on a knee, puts up his right arm and rests on the left arm as he implores for a favourable verdict. No luck.
works him with the spin this time to pick a single
Mahmudullah turns the strike over with another safe single through the off side
swings him away across the line and picks up four through square leg. The fielder there had a chance to haul that in, but messed it up
defended back to the bowler off the back foot
turned away through midwicket off the front foot
driven uppishly to extra cover off the front foot
tries to wok him away off the pads but can't beat short fine leg
goes for the cut to a delivery turning away, and it goes off the outside edge towards short third man, Ray Price
good end to the over, almost yorker length delivery dug out to the bowler
takes a comfortable single as he drives this flighted delivery to long off
gets width outside off, and capitalises, creaming it through extra cover well wide of the sweeper on the boundary for a four
worked away to short fine leg
Shakib is turning it on here, goes for a flat sweep in front of square, Taylor had it covered but it rolled away onto the ropes
and another one, this time he sweeps it to the fine leg boundary, to the right of short fine and to the left of deep square leg, super placement
digs out this yorker length delivery with an open face to short third man
works it away to midwicket off the back foot
calmly pats this fuller one down the track
goes for the cut, and gets an underedge that races away fine for a boundary, lucky but Bangladesh will take them
tucked away through miwicket
drives down to long off for another run
turning down the pads, tucked away to backward square leg
Meth runs in and bowls a shortish one, which Shakib pulls away to deep midwicket, adjusted well for the low bounce
full on the pads, picked away to deep midwicket, Zimbabwe have released the pressure here
slower one, 77.5 kph, he picks it and hits it down the ground to long on
another single is taken with a drive to long on
gets some extra bounce from short of a good length that surprises Shakib, and he plays it out towards cover
close shave for Shakib, he looked to cut this short delivery, it was a touch close for the shot, and got an inside edge that rolled away fine for a boundary
defended back down the track
driven back to the bowler who dives and fields
nicely flighted up, he pushes it out towards cover
stays in the crease and punches to midwicket
strays down the leg side
played back to the bowler off the back foot
reaches forward to defend towards cover, they are not taking any chances against Price, no need to as well, the asking rate is under control
gets some room outside off, cuts it away wide of the man at sweeper cover who runs across and cuts it off
goes for the cover drive but mistimes it to short extra cover
well, the single to long on is always on with a nice drive along the ground
tossed up around off and driven back to the bowler
gets forward and eases this one down to mid off
turning down the pads, he tucks it away straight to square leg
tossed up high in the air on middle stump, he gets forward to defend
a drive to long off gives Shakib Al Hasan his 16th ODI half-century
coming on with the arm, adjusts ti cut it to backward point
Price strays down leg again, and the batsman misses out on the forcing sweep
goes for another sweep, straight to backward square leg
back to normal business, another single with a drive to long off
brings out the reverse sweep, is lucky it didn't carry to short third man
cut away to deep point off the back foot for a single
way down the pads, Shakib tries to help it fine but it rolls away to short fine leg
misses out again on another one down the pads, appeal for caught behind, maybe it took the thigh pad on its way to Tatenda
nicely driven down to long off for a single
tossed up delivery induces the drive, and the outside edge goes away to short third man, could have gone anywhere, even for a boundary, now then
on the pads, and is picked away for a single in front of square leg
goes for the drive to a fullish ball outside off but get an inside edge towards mid on
gets behind the line to defend this length delivery towards extra cover
tries to tap this one in front of cover and go for the single, but Mpofu is quite near, and they decide against it
guided with an open bat face to backward point

Mahmudullah goes for the maximum straight down the ground out of nowhere, and ends up hitting a full delivery down long on's throat, Mpofu is dleighted and does a little jig, important breakthrough for Zimbabwe
shortish and turning in, played out to extra cover
turns into him sharply, he adjusts to push it back to the bowler
defends another one on off stump down the track
reaches out to drive without power to cover
cuts, and cuts in the gap, it was short and turning in, he went back and hammered it through extra cover for a boundary
good comeback by the bowler, beats him on the forward prod, Taibu takes off the bails, but no harm done
slapped away to sweeper cover for a single to bring Mash on strike
tossed up delivery turns in past the attempted drive, Taibu gathers
tries to work him square but hits it towards midwicket
driven to extra cover for no runs, good over so far
finally he gets the single with a drive past point
they steal a single first ball with a tuck in front of midwicket, Mash dives right into the stumps at the non-striker's, well run, brings Shakib on strike
stays in the crease and guides this one on the stumps to backward point
swatted away to deep midwicket but he'll only get a single
gives him the charge, Price shortens the length, Mash can only defend
this time he skips down the track, and gets the connection with a loft over extra cover for a boundary, well played
goes on the back foot to hammer it down to long off, and will retain strike
and Mash lifts him straight down the ground, and it falls just short of the man at long off, lucky to get away with it
bowls a long hop, short and gentle on the stumps, Shakib backs away and swings it over extra cover for a boundary, poor ball this one

and we have a run out here of all things, it was a yorker around off, dug out to backward point, Chibhabha fired in the throw, Shakib was charging down the track, Mash had to run, and sacrificed his wicket as Taibu took off the bails gleefully, and then went down on the ground, Shakib is distraught
and hits it down to long on for a single
makes room and drives to extra cover who is right on the fence, fires in a wayward throw, and Shakib somehow makes his ground, a better throw and he was gone
good last ball from Meth, right in the blockhole, dug out down the ground to long on for a single. and Shakib will not be on strike next over
Razzak drives a full delivery to cover and gets a single to bring Shakib on strike
serves up a full toss on middle stump, and Shakib cashes in, crashing it over extra cover for a boundary, he needed to put it away, and did

and Shakib has fallen! he went for the scoop over short fine leg, and got a top edge that looped up to that man for the simplest of takes, the crowd is stunned, totally, one wicket to go now, shakib was in no position for that shot, just tried to help it on its way
gets well forward to guide this length delivery to short third man
in the corridor outside off, and he gets an under edge that goes on the bounce through to Taibu
gets forward to defend this length delivery and takes it on the high part of the blade
ooh, almost got him there, it was a full toss around off stump, he drove it back to the bowler, Meth fired in the throw even as Razzak was almost half way down, but missed
drives to the man on the edge of the circle at extra cover for a single
89.7 kph slower delivery, he drives it wide of the man at long off for a couple of runs
in the blockhole, dug out into the on side for a quick single, 200 is up for Bangladesh
mishit down to extra cover for a single

it's all over! Zimbabwe have won, it was full and slapped away to midwicket, they took Taylor on for the single, the throw came in to Meth even as both batsmen were mid-pitch, and Meth took off the bails with a grin, fourth run out of the innings, and Zimbabwe are over the moon
